# URLRequest.CachePolicy

**Type Alias**

An alias for the cache policy.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias CachePolicy = NSURLRequest.CachePolicy
```

## Discussion

This type is an alias to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLRequest/CachePolicy-swift.enum].

## Working with a cache policy

- **cachePolicy**: The request’s cache policy.
- **NSURLRequest.CachePolicy**: The constants used to specify interaction with the cached responses.

items.description: The constants used to specify interaction with the cached responses.
